com.threerings.nexus.util
Class Log.Logger

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.nexus.util.Log.Logger
Direct Known Subclasses:
Log.JavaLogger
Enclosing class:
Log
public abstract static class Log.Logger
extends Object

A level of indirection that allows us to plug in Java or GWT-based logging.

Constructor Summary
Log.Logger()
           
 
Method Summary
abstract  void info(String message, Object... args)
          Logs an info level message, with the supplied arguments and optional Throwable cause in final position.
abstract  void setWarnOnly()
          Disables info logging, shows only warnings and above.
abstract  void warning(String message, Object... args)
          Logs a warning level message, with the supplied arguments and optional Throwable cause in final position.

Constructor Detail

Log.Logger

public Log.Logger()
Method Detail

info

public abstract void info(String message,
                          Object... args)
Logs an info level message, with the supplied arguments and optional Throwable cause in final position. For example: log.info("Thing happened", "info", data, "also", moredata);

warning

public abstract void warning(String message,
                             Object... args)
Logs a warning level message, with the supplied arguments and optional Throwable cause in final position. For example: log.warning("Bad thing happened", "info", data, cause);

setWarnOnly

public abstract void setWarnOnly()
Disables info logging, shows only warnings and above.
